Create a personalized notebook cover design: Use AI to create a custom notebook cover design based on the user's preferences, such as favorite colors, patterns, and text.
Smart notebook with built-in AI: Develop a notebook with built-in AI capabilities that can recognize handwriting and automatically categorize notes based on the content.
Virtual notebook: Create a virtual notebook that can be accessed from any device, allowing users to take notes and organize them in a digital format.
Smartpen with augmented reality: Develop a smartpen that can recognize handwriting and display augmented reality graphics or animations based on the user's notes.

AI-powered note-taking app: Create an AI-powered note-taking app that can recognize handwriting and automatically categorize notes based on the content, as well as suggest related topics and provide insights based on the user's notes.
